title-text.name: Change title text
title-text.description: Whether the title screen Geometry Dash text gets skewed.

title-buttons.name: Change title buttons
title-buttons.description: Whether the title screen newgrounds button gets replaced by Geode.

map-packs.name: Remove map packs (HIGHLY RECOMMENDED)
map-packs.description: Whether the map pack button gets removed

remove-corners.name: Remove corners
remove-corners.description: Whether corners gets removed from menus.

remove-level-select-top.name: Remove level select topper
remove-level-select-top.description: Whether the top bar thingymabob gets removed from the main level select screen.

fix-joystick-scroll.name: Fix joystick indicator
fix-joystick-scroll.description: Whether the joystick indicator gets moved from behind other buttons.

move-betterinfo.name: Move BetterInfo button
move-betterinfo.description: Whether the BetterInfo button gets moved into the corner. *BetterInfo must be installed.

replace-more-games-w-texture.name: Replace "More Games" with texture pack
replace-more-games-w-texture.description: Whether the More Games button on the title screen gets replaced with the texture pack selector. *Texture Loader must be installed.

fire-in-the-hole.name: FIRE IN THE HOLE
fire-in-the-hole.description: Whether the play button on the title screen plays "FIRE IN THE HOLE" when clicked.

garage-bg-remove.name: Remove icon kit's icon selector background
garage-bg-remove.description: Whether the background behind the icons in the icon kit should be removed.

garage-lock-tap-remove.name: Remove "Tap lock for more info!" message
garage-lock-tap-remove.description: Whether the "Tap lock for more info!" message in the icon kit should be removed. WARNING: this may be wildly incompatible with other mods that modify the icon kit.

fix-main-menu-settings-gamepad.name: Fix the main menu's settings gamepad icon
fix-main-menu-settings-gamepad.description: Whether the d-pad down gamepad icon on the main menu gets adjusted. Only turn this on if the positioning is broken, else it might make it worse.

randomise-main-menu-bg.name: Randomise the main menu background
randomise-main-menu-bg.description: Whether the background of the main menu gets randomised on startup. This doesn't allow the loading screen to be changed, sadly, and also won't randomise the ground.
